description: RCS has come a long way since Apple jumped on board in 2024. But for a while, editing messages from Android to iPhone just wasn't possible. Now it is, though there's a small catch. Read more...
title: Android users can now edit texts sent to iPhones, but with a catch

description: Microsoft has released a new PowerToys version, 0.92. The new release brings several improvements and new features. Read more...
title: PowerToys 0.92 brings performance boost, speed test, Windows 11 24H2 default browser fix

description: Apple has filed a lawsuit against a former employee, claiming he took Vision Pro trade secrets with him to his new job at Snap. Read more...
title: Apple sues ex-Vision Pro engineer for allegedly stealing trade secrets before joining Snap

description: Sony is running a limited-time deal on the Bravia Theater Bar 6 and System 6 audio systems as they are selling at great prices. Read more...
title: Sony Bravia Theater 6 deals sees these Dolby Atmos, DTS speakers at their lowest prices

description: Threads turns two and Meta's latest makeover of the app could change how you connect and discover content on it. Read more...
title: Meta marks two years of Threads with two major updates reshaping user experience

description: Mojang has revealed that the third Minecraft Game Drop of 2025 will be Copper focused, adding new tools, an item-sorting Copper Golem, armor, and more. Read more...
title: Next Minecraft update makes Copper useful, adding new tools, weapons, armor, and a Golem

description: Grammarly has announced it's buying Superhuman, the email app built for power users, as part of its push to grow its AI-powered productivity tools. Read more...
title: Superhuman acquired by Grammarly in AI-focused deal

description: Meta's WhatsApp makeover brings unified Ads Manager, AI chat support, and new voice features for both small and large businesses. Read more...
title: Meta unveils WhatsApp upgrades with unified ads, AI tools, and voice support for businesses

description: With Prime Day almost being here, Amazon is offering a big chunk of games to claim for Prime Gaming members, including Tomb Raider I-III Remastered, Saints Row IV, Star Wars: Rebellion, and more. Read more...
title: Prime Gaming brings Endless Space 2, Saints Row IV, Tomb Raider Remastered, and more in July

description: It seems that Microsoft can't truly kill off Skype once and for all, and the culprit this time around seems to be a missing configuration in Teams. Read more...
title: Skype for Business Server SE now available because Teams can't solve one problem

description: The second bug fix release for KDE Plasma 6.4 is now live, addressing issues in components like Discover, Spectacle, and more. Read more...
title: KDE releases Plasma 6.4.2 bringing multiple bug fixes

description: Google and Sparkasse plan to roll out Europe's first wallet‑based age verification to safeguard privacy. Read more...
title: Google and Sparkasse pioneer EU‑scale, wallet‑based digital age checks

description: Topping releases another device that produces high quality sound without the usual high price tag. The DX5 II covers a lot of ground, but does it hit that ground running, or does it face plant? Read more...
title: Topping DX5 II review - High spec headphones amp, DAC & pre-amplifier for under $300

description: The Amazon CEO's recent interview brought bad news for the company's employees, as more of them may soon receive layoff notices. Read more...
title: Amazon to lay off more staff as AI dominates every department

description: Cloudflare is currently testing a solution that paywalls content specifically for AI web crawlers. The company has resurrected HTTP response code 402 for this purpose. Read more...
title: Cloudflare has a plan to make AI agents pay for crawling websites

description: Transform the way you work with PDFs on your Mac! Edit text, replace images, and more with PDF Reader Pro's advanced tools. Read more...
title: Save 62% off lifetime updates to PDF Reader Pro (for Mac or Windows)

description: Last month, The Document Foundation launched a campaign urging Office users to try out LibreOffice. Now, it has followed up with a user guide for version 25.2 to help make the switch easier. Read more...
title: LibreOffice takes aim at Microsoft Office with free guides to help users switch

description: Follow FC as he steals from the world's most secure banks and government facilities--without breaking a single law. Read more...
title: How I Rob Banks: And Other Such Places eBook (worth $25) free until July 8

description: Gamers will be able to pre-order D3Publisher's latest game, Full Metal Schoolgirl, from July 2 on PlayStation 5. It's also coming to Nintendo Switch 2 and PC. Read more...
title: Full Metal Schoolgirl throws cyborg students into a corporate death trap this October

description: Nvidia's RTX hardware family is gaining its most budget-oriented member today with the RTX 5050. The new 576.88 driver is now available with full support for the GPU as well as bug fixes. Read more...
title: Nvidia 576.88 driver adds support for RTX 5050, Mecha Break, and more DLSS 4 games

description: Microsoft is bringing in Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4, Minami Lane, and more games to its Game Pass services in the next couple of weeks. Read more...
title: Xbox Game Pass gains Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4, High On Life, and more in July

description: Microsoft recently extended the support date for Windows 10 under the ESU program and it works almost for free. However, the company has still been criticized. Read more...
title: Microsoft gets pummeled as Windows 10 'free' extended support won't save "400 million" PCs

description: Microsoft Intune is broken right now and might cause headaches for IT admins if they attempt to update their security baseline profiles. Read more...
title: Microsoft confirms Intune is broken right now

description: REDMAGIC is launching its Astra Gaming Tablet on July 16, and we were given the opportunity to take it for a spin ahead of its launch. Read more...
title: REDMAGIC Astra Gaming Tablet review: 9-inches of OLED goodness and massive 8,200mAh battery

description: Are you a student looking for an affordable tablet that you can get productive on? If so, check out the Amazon Fire Max 11 Productivity Bundle now and save 36%. Read more...
title: Amazon Fire Max 11 Productivity Bundle: A capable tablet for $235.99

description: Nearly four years after the initial release, Windows 11's market share finally caught up to Windows 10. Read more...
title: Windows 11's market share makes a big jump, finally catches up to Windows 10

description: Opera for Android 90 is now available with improvements to Aria AI and bookmark folders that can now have their own emoji. Read more...
title: Opera for Android 90 has a smarter Aria AI and more engaging bookmark folders

description: Microsoft has published an update to its blog post, which previously implied that Windows has over a billion monthly active users, down from 1.4 billion in 2022. Read more...
title: Microsoft: No, we haven't lost 400 million Windows customers

description: Apple's AI woes have reportedly led the company to consider OpenAI and Anthropic to power the next-generation version of Siri. Read more...
title: Siri may soon rely on OpenAI or Anthropic as Apple continues to struggle with AI

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 will be held from June 8-11. The company says that this will be its biggest event to date with up to 40% off on tech deals. Read more...
title: Amazon Prime Day deals are back from July 8-11 this year

description: It is that time of the year again. Microsoft is now quietly installing the KB5001716 update on users' Windows 10 and 11 systems. Read more...
title: Microsoft quietly installs KB5001716 on your Windows 11 and 10 PCs

description: Opera is launching a new version of Pro VPN, offering customers faster speeds, a new protocol, more locations, and other upgrades. Read more...
title: Opera Pro VPN gets a new protocol, more locations, and faster speeds

description: Nvidia has some bad news for those who still use some of the company's most beloved and legendary graphics cards. Read more...
title: Nvidia is soon ending driver support for some of its most legendary graphics cards

description: Want to learn how to prevent embarrassing notifications interrupting your screen sharing during Teams meetings? Read on to learn how. Read more...
title: Avoid awkward pop-ups: Master Teams notifications during screen sharing

description: Microsoft recently argued that the New Outlook for Windows app is actually not as bad as many users feel. To prove it, the company confirms several new PST features. Read more...
title: New Outlook for Windows getting support for several new PST features

description: Microsoft has made PostgreSQL 17 generally available on Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server. It has also enabled in-place upgrades to improve the experience. Read more...
title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL 17 is here with seamless in-place upgrades

description: Microsoft has started rolling out Storyline, a social media-style feed in Teams, following up on its promise from last year. Read more...
title: Microsoft adds Storyline, a social media-style feed, to Teams

description: After years of users resorting to clunky workarounds just to get sound when sharing Spotify tracks in Instagram Stories, the platform has finally added built-in support for audio. Read more...
title: Sharing Spotify songs with sound to Instagram Stories is finally possible

description: Microsoft has announced four new updates for Microsoft Planner. One of the changes is a bulk editing feature while the rest improve the Project Manager agent. Read more...
title: Microsoft Planner gets bulk editing feature and three improvements for Project Manager agent
